reviewText:
If you are a fan of the original TheFirm, you will love this workout.  It's filmed live so a few mistakes are expected.  Small things like doing more reps on one side than the other and a few times they had  problems with the microphone.

It's a ton of fun.  The moves are really fast, so I use it on aerobic days with light weights.  It's fine for all levels.  You will need dumbbells, a small ball, tall step and a mat.
